posts.post_title: T206 Cobb Red Back Up For Sale
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Jason Silvey
First deal on the card fell through. Asking $380 shipped/insured. Paypal add 3%. Not sure what's on the card, but it looks similar to whatever is on the Nagy w/ the Cobb Back. It is not creased and is ungraded in my opinion, especially when compared to the Nagy which is an SGC 20.
